WorkletSharedStorageGet.summary:
The get() method of the
interface retrieves a value from shared storage.

remarks.para:
-Shared Storage API
-Noise and scaling on developer.chrome.com (2023)

WorkletSharedStorageGet.returns: A that fulfills with either a string equal to the value of the retrieved key-value pair or undefined if the specified key is not found in the shared storage.
